Cover the essentials to surfing with a camp perfect for kids interested in learning a new sport. Head to St. Augustine for guided lessons where you master the basics with other young boarders.

- Have fun with a guided surf camp for kids located along the sandy shores of St. Augustine
- Work with an expert instructor, who has years of practice teaching first-time or inexperienced surfers
- Get a grip on the the fundamentals with a land lesson and water session: Put what you learn into practice as you hang ten
- Pick up plenty of tips and tricks along the way to feel confident in your abilities in no time

Set off on a beginner-friendly kayaking tour of Trinidad Bay and harbor. Experience the wonders of ocean paddling without having to deal with a strong surf and breaking waves.

- Get basic instruction and safety information on land and in the harbor before exploring the coast along Little River
- Spot a wide variety of wildlife from the seat of your kayak, including all sorts of migratory sea and shorebirds, seals, sea lions, otters, sea stars, anemones, urchins, and more
- Glide past the rock gardens, towering sea stacks, and kelp forests of the Redwood Coast as you breathe in the fresh air
- Look out for thousands of migrating grey whales that make their way north with their calves from Baja to Alaska
- Guided kayaking tour

entries.name: Trinidad Bay Kayaking Tour

blurbs.value: Cast your line on this deep sea fishing adventure aboard a 65 foot cruiser. Reel in black sea bass, flounder and many other tasty catches.

- Cruise out into the open sea aboard The Angler, a spacious fishing boat where you cast your line and reel in flounder, sea bass, tautog and bluefish
- Gain important knowledge and expertise from your friendly crew, who takes you to a great fishing spot and teaches you technique that can help you land a prize catch
- Prepare for your journey without worry as bait, rod, and reel will be on board and ready to use

- Trip on the Angler
- Rod, reel, tackle and bait
- Experienced Crew

Parking is available in a lot near The Angler Restaurant. The restaurant can prepare a boxed lunch for you to take on board or you may plan for breakfast there before going out. No fishing license is required for this tour.

entries.name: Ocean City Ten-Hour Deep Sea Fishing Trip

blurbs.value: Take a tour of Frank Lloyd Wright's iconic American System-Built Homes. Learn about this famous architect's earliest system of low-cost housing and discover his unique ability to create beautiful, affordable spaces for low-income families.

- Tour two of Frank Lloyd Wright's famous buildings, including the Model B1 and a two-family design
- Gain insight into the history and theory behind these beautiful homes from knowledgable docents
- Discover some of Wright's lesser-known masterpieces and his ingenious ability to make beautiful spaces accessible for low-income residents

- Tours of two buildings (Model B1 and a two-family design)
- Knowledgable and friendly guide

- We regret to inform you that the homes are not handicapped accessible
- Tours last approximately 30-45 minutes
- Children under 16 years of age can participate for free (must be accompanied by parents).

entries.name: Tour of Frank Lloyd Wright's System-Built Homes in Milwaukee

On Marco Island’s Jet Ski Tour we will guide you deep into the wonders of the Ten Thousand Islands. You will be able to reach areas that boats are unable to access, and see the beautiful landscape from a new point of view.

- We will gladly take pictures for you to share with friends and family at no additional charge.

See San Francisco's most notoriously haunted places while hearing ghost stories from your knowledgeable and entertaining guide. Take in the Victorian architecture and learn what makes this city such a spooky destination.

- Discover San Fransisco's haunted past with a local leading the way on this ninety-minute to two-hour guided tour 
- Uncover the past of the city's most renowned former residents; hear how they lived and died—and the reports surrounding these events
- Enjoy scenic San Francisco as you walk past tree-lined streets and fine Victorian architecture
- Ninety-minute to two-hour guided ghost tour

- Not suitable for children under the age of ten
- Unfortunately, there are no options for bathroom breaks
- Drinking or drunken behavior will not be tolerated
- Unless it's a service or emotional support animal, pets are not allowed
- The tour takes place on the streets and hills of San Francisco, and it's mostly flat but there is one steep climb
Please dress warmly or in layers.

- Break into the safety deposit box and steal the money, working your way from the bank teller’s office into the vault

Explore the stunning scenery around Hilton Head Island on a two-hour boat tour. Watch for dolphins swimming through the waves as you sit back, relax and enjoy the warm sunlight.

- Come aboard the spacious Carolina Skiffs, a cruiser with a deck ideal for seaside viewing and a covering that offers plenty of shade
- Feast your eyes on wild dolphins playing alongside the boat for an up-close glimpse of these friendly critters
- Enjoy a small group setting for a comfortable trip and one-on-one interaction with your friendly guides

Spend the day exploring one of Moab's best mountain biking routes. Get dropped off safely and comfortably with a local shuttle that gets you right where you want to be.

- Head over to 'Mag 7', a must-do spot with several amazing trails, including Gemini Bridges, Bull Run and Great Escape
- Explore the best riding trails this area has to offer, pedaling along at a pace that works for you

blurbs.value: Explore a synagogue that impresses from the inside out, on a tour of the Beth Sholom Synagogue. Designed by the famed architect Frank Lloyd Wright, this tour takes you on a fascinating journey of Jewish history, culture, and classic American architecture.

- Start your tour in awe as you get your first glimpse of an impressive building designed by Frank Lloyd Wright
- Tour through a number of exhibits that explore the history of the congregates and the Synagogue itself, with interactive kiosks that tell a detailed story of the building to help shape your experience visiting an incredible "House of Peace" 
- Get a glimpse of original sketches and blueprints authored by famed architect Frank Lloyd Wright

- 20 minute film viewing on the history of the Beth Sholom Synagogue 
- 1 hour tour of the Synagogue

The parking lot is located behind the building. Enter under the green awning and turn right. There may be last minute changes to tour schedule. Synagogue is hot during summer months, and is not open on days of worship. Elevator entrance is located on the outside of the building.  Go to the Visitor Center for access.
Designed by the famed architect Frank Lloyd Wright, this tour takes you on a fascinating journey of Jewish history, culture, and classic American architecture.

entries.name: Beth Sholom Synagogue Tour

blurbs.value: Learn the fundamentals of surfing with a ninety-minute lesson in the warm waters of St. Augustine. Master the basics and put what you learn into practice for a thrilling time.

- Master the fundamentals of surfing on land, then try out what you learn on the water for a complete lesson

Soar through dense forests at high speeds on a ziplining adventure through the Pocono Mountains. See the gorgeous sights as the wind blows back your hair and you take on all nine ziplining elements.

- Satisfy your inner adrenaline junkie with nine different ziplining routes that have it all, from dangling ladders to swaying bridges 
- Suit up in a safety harness as an instructor goes over the basics of ziplining with you
- Have fun on a course tailored to all levels as you breathe in the fresh air and look out over green-filled landscapes

-Closed toed shoes are required.
-Weight Requirement: Between 40 lbs and 250 lbs

Bring your own bottle of wine to help get the creative juices flowing while having fun doing it in this creative pottery class

Uncover the classic Italian city of Bologna one bite at a time on a guided food tour. Enjoy traditional Italian dishes at restaurants and eateries loved by locals.

- Check out six delicious spots, enjoying everything from homemade pasta to artisanal gelato 
- Head to a nearby pasta factory, learning about the history of the facility and how pasta is made 
- Explore off-the-beaten-path destinations most tourists don't know about, including a bustling food market

blurbs.value: Explore New Haven your way with a pedal bike ride through this charming town. Cruise along on jumbo-sized bike that you pedal with your group as you check out the parts of town you want to see.

- Head to the area's hottest bars and restaurants, marveling at historic buildings and the impressive architecture along the way
- Feel free to bring your own booze to enjoy as you pedal along, getting a feel for this classic city
- Split the pedaling work with a fun bike that's steered by your guide and powered by your crew

blurbs.value: Embark on an exclusive airboat adventure through the lush Central Florida Everglades with your own private boat and tour guide.

- Private 60 minute tour of the Lake Cypress Everglades in a large state-of-the-art U.S. Coast Guard approved airboat
- Insight into the rich, natural biodiversity of the swampland ecosystem from an experienced local captain and guide
- Opportunity to see a range of wildlife in their natural habitat, including alligators, waterfowl, and bald eagles
- Complimentary entry to an on-site Wildlife Park which features a massive aviary, swampland boardwalk, more than 100 species and a hands-on alligator demonstration
- Park admission is included

- Bring sunglasses, a hat, and sun screen 
- Food and beverages not included
- 4 Person minimum for private boat tour

entries.name: One Hour Private Lake Cypress Airboat Tour

blurbs.value: Cancellations made within a 24-hour period will forego the refunded ticket price.

Cruise through the two top and well-loved neighborhoods in New Orleans – the Garden District and the French Quarter. Bike past memorable mansions and iconic sights to learn what makes these spots so fantastic!

- Glimpse historic mansions, iconic landmarks, and the Irish Channel while riding through the city streets 
- Ride on a bike tour that combines the best of two historic neighborhoods in New Orleans
- Ideal for riders looking for a historical and cultural overview of New Orleans

- Bike
- Optional helmet
- Bottled water
- Knowledgable guide
Tours run rain or shine. Please bring sunscreen, comfortable clothing, and a camera. All participants must be 12 and older. All riders under 18 must be accompanied by a parent or guardian.

entries.name: New Orleans Garden District and French Quarter Bike Tour

blurbs.value: We'll bring you on a tour of the details behind New Orleans' dark history. You'll visit the French Quarter where the echoes of gruesome crimes still cry out. You'll see where it all happened!

Maybe ghost stories don’t quite pique your interest, but you have that curiosity about the dark side of humanity. Some of the most terrifying things are what people do to each other, and perhaps you want to glimpse into this corrupt corner of existence.

We’ll bring you on a tour of the sordid details behind New Orleans’ dark, bloody murders. You’ll visit locations in the French Quarter where the echoes of gruesome crimes of murder still cry out.

Our city, while soulful and charming, has always had a seedy side from its beginnings. From being settled by the dregs of France to the delinquency and depravity of today, discover a place where the unspeakable still happens.

You’ll see where it all happened, and understand the history behind it.
Tours are about a mile walk. Tour is designed to be 1.5 hours but can run up to 2 hours. Check-in is 15 minutes prior to start.
Content is for mature audiences, 16 and over.

For everyone’s courtesy, tours leave on time. Tours go on rain or shine. The tour does not end where the tour starts. Guests will be helped after the tour with directions to where they are going next.

entries.name: Sinister Criminal Intentions - True Crime & Murder Tour

blurbs.value:

Join us for a premier nightlife experience as we take you from bar to bar and club to club; all you need to do is show up!

- HUNDREDS of bars in New Orleans and we have the inside scoop on the BEST spots in town.
- We’ve made the arrangements, gotten the drink specials, and free drinks, so you don’t have to!
- Just show up and we’ll take care of EVERYTHING else.
- We'll take care of drinks at the beginning of the crawl with Party Games and drink specials through the evening...no lineups and all overcharges are included.
- Our team has experience running parties in Las Vegas, Miami, and Ibiza - we KNOW a good time.
- We get the night started with complimentary games to get everyone loose and ready to mingle.

- 4 Venues 
- 1 Night 
- Free Drinks 
- No Cover
- Must be 21+

entries.name: New Orleans VIP Bar & Club Crawl

blurbs.value: Cancellations with less than a 24 hour notice are not eligible for a refund.
New Orleans is a gumbo of religions and cultures. Join us to explore this strange city and its dark past. This is NOT your grandmother's tour. This, my friend, is the real New Orleans!

- Take a deep dive into New Orleans - a hot, humid and sometimes unforgiving place where in the dead of summer the air takes on the quality of a crayfish boil
- Experience the culture and history of the place where God and the Devil shook hands so the party could go on!
- Thrill at tales of the adventures of the faithful and the fallen alike—that made New Orleans forever unique
One of our hilarious historians will guide you through the best and the worst of New Orleans!

- Adults 17 and older only
- Must be 21+ to consume alcohol

- We tour rain or shine. Should you anticipate inclement weather please bring along a poncho or umbrella. 
- Please arrive 15 minute early to collect your tickets from the Saints & Sinners box office. The box office opens one hour prior to all scheduled tours. Come on inside and look to the back wall; it says TICKETS in neon above our door. 
- We have buy-one-get-one-FREE Hurricanes during the hour before each tour time for our nighttime tour guests!

entries.name: Saints & Sinners Tour of New Orleans

Explore the underwater world on a three-tank scuba dive adventure. See sharks, wrecks, and reefs all up close!

- Take part in a three dive excursion, spending an hour at each location while also getting a hour to relax between each
- Work with a professional who will show you where to go along with providing you tips and tricks along the way
- Get hooked up with everything you need for a fun and safe time out in the water, including dive weights and more

- Three tank dive
- Dive weights
- Lunch, snacks, and beverages

- Each individual is required to provide their gear, including a wetsuit, a hood, gloves, and booties, as well as a dive computer and surface marker buoy. However, we do provide tank rentals of either aluminum 80s or steel (variety of sizes in HP/LP). There is also a local dive shop if you do not have your own full wetsuit with hood and gloves (important that gear has no bright colors).

- We depart at 8:00 a.m and arrive roughly around 2 p.m. for an approximately 6-hour trip, but this duration may vary. 
- A crew member will greet you in the parking lot and assist you with bringing your gear to the boat.
- Lazy Daze, our 30-foot Island Hopper is quite spacious and comfortable as we limit our trips to a max of 6 divers.
- We provide weights, snacks, and a variety of beverages. Lunch is provided on 3-tank dive trips only.
- Bathrooms are available for divers.

Discover the haunted history of the French Quarter on this creepy haunted ghost tour of New Orleans. Hear the famed tales and visit the REAL buildings with a local historian and entertainer on New Orleans' creepiest experience.

Your group of up to 12 people will be instructed on the house rules, and taught how to throw an axe by our “Axe Master”. After that, you get, 90-minutes to play your section of fun games, or play your own!

- Learn the proper techniques to axe throwing to ensure safety and fun go hand-in-hand
- Pick up plenty of tips and tricks from someone who has years of experience and insider knowledge
- Have fun using your newfound skills to throw axes at a target and see if you can nab the bullseye

Spend the morning in Sintra visiting Pena Park and the Quinta da Regaleira. Enjoy a typical Portuguese lunch in town, then travel to continental Europe's westernmost point. Finish your day at Cascais.

- Visit Sintra's Pena Park and Palace, which showcase the rich tradition of 19th-century romanticism and which are home to more than 500 different species of trees 
- Head to Quinta da Regaleira, an estate with a romantic palace, chapel, and park: Check out lakes, grottoes, wells, fountains and more
- Uncover the best-preserved medieval royal residence is Portuguese: Snap photos of this structure to take home and show off
- Have lunch in a typical restaurant in the town center and enjoy some free time to visit shops or take a stroll in the narrow and colorful streets
- Head to Cabo da Roca, the westernmost point of Continental Europe, then hit up Guincho beach, which is known for its big waves

- Pick up & Drop-off at your hotel/accommodation in Central Lisbon
- Entrance fee to Pena Park
- Entrance fee to Quinta da Regaleira
- Informative driver/guide
- Bottled water
- Wi-Fi
- Transportation in a van with AC
- Legal Insurance according to Portuguese Law

entries.name: Sintra Small Group Tour From Lisbon

Come enjoy Mansfield’s foremost ultimate escape room entertainment!
You've been caught by a world class assassin. He is out completing a mission and will deal with you when he returns. Escape if you can!

- Take part in an escape room challenge, an interactive game where you're locked in a room and have to think your way out

- Work with your friends as you race against the clock and have tons of fun in the process
- One-hour escape room challenge

entries.name: Assassins Apartment Escape Room

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least seven days in advance.

Get in touch with your inner artist during this one-hour glassblowing workshop in Providence. Learn how to make your very own glass ornament with the help of a friendly instructor, who walks you through the process.

- Get a hands-on lesson about the process of glassblowing, an ancient art that is still practiced by modern artisans 
- Work with a professional glassblower to practice the key steps of the craft in an interactive workshop
- Take advantage of an optimal student-to-teacher ratio for a more personalized experience that guarantees you learn something
- Work with various tools and colors to create a one-of-kind ornament to take home and show off to friends or family

- One-hour ornament class 
- Take-home ornament next  business day.

entries.name: Make Your Own Blown Glass Ornament Class

blurbs.value: Experience the softer side of the city beneath a setting sun as you kayak past Chicago's world-renowned architecture.

- Explore the city skyline at dusk for picturesque views of the running river, lush lake and towering buildings
- Get a crash-course in kayaking from a knowledgeable guide to learn basic skills, strokes, and safety rules — no experience necessary prior to your tour
- Enjoy quality equipment, a great workout, and a new perspective on Chicago's architectural relevance

Choose single or double boats upon arrival. Please arrive 15 minutes prior to departure.
Bring sunglasses, sunblock, a hat, and a waterproof bag to protect your camera. Dress for the weather. Lightweight, synthetic clothing is best.

entries.name: Chicago Sunset Kayaking Tour

blurbs.value: 100% refund at any time.
Start the experience with an interactive tour of our distillery and finish by tasting our products! We keep our tours small so you can expect to be with a maximum of 10 people.

- Experience a detailed tour walk through our production facility, manufacturing, barrel aging house, event space and new cocktail lounge
- Sample a range of delicious products all made by us in house
- Stick around after the event - our delicious cocktails and food are available for purchase!

entries.name: Distillery Tour & Tasting Package in New Richmond

blurbs.value: Guest must arrive 15 minutes before departure time. Failure to arrive on time is considered a no show and will forfeit the full amount prepaid for the ride. All sales are final. 24 hour notice must be given to reschedule the ride. $10 fee for each client request to reschedule after the 1st. Any Rides that Pine River must reschedule due to unforeseen circumstances will be done at no charge. However, the group must reschedule within 30 days of the of reservation. Failure to reschedule in a timely manner will result in forfeiting full funds.
Enjoy an afternoon of family fun in the saddle! Explore over 100 acres of wooded trails, open meadows and small hills for your horseback riding pleasure.

- Experience trails, meadows, and small hills riding horseback
- Take photos of wildlife along the seasonal creek
- View blooming flowers in the spring, feel the warmth of the sun during the summer, and admire the changing colors of fall

- Horse and saddle
- Experienced and knowledgable guide

- Participants must be 8+ years
- Helmets are required
- Wavier required
- No water bottles, purses/backpacks, go-pros/video cameras, selfie sticks or shirts tied around your waist will be allowed on the trail

- Please bring a helmet
- Wear close-toed shoes and long pants

entries.name: Weekend Horseback Riding in St. Clair

blurbs.value: No refunds.

Choose how you'll explore the sights and history of Dallas on a hop-on, hop-off tour aboard an old-fashioned trolley complete with modern amenities like air conditioning. Cruise around downtown while picking and choosing your stops as you get a great overview of all that the city has to offer.

- Get a complete view of Dallas on a tour that hits all the important landmarks and popular stops 
- Hop off the trolley and explore the destinations that interest you and hop back on for a new adventure
- Make stops at Dealey Plaza, The Omni Hotel, Reunion Tower, DWA, The Perot Museum,  American Airlines Center (AAC), Thanksgiving Square, Famers Market, Neiman Marcus, Pioneer Plaza, and more
- Ride aboard an authentic Dallas trolley, complete with charming brass fixtures and updated for your comfort with air conditioning and other modern perks
Parking is available behind the 6th Floor Museum for $7 per day.

entries.name: Downtown Dallas Hop-On Hop-Off Trolley Tour

blurbs.value: Once purchased, tickets cannot be refunded and can only be rescheduled by the vendor 24hrs prior to the trip.

Go on an adventurous, fishing trip and explore the deep blue waters of the Florida Gulf! You'll cruise out to a fisherman's paradise and have the opportunity to cast your line to catch a number of different fish!

- Catch a variety of fish such as Grouper,Grey Snapper, Sea Bass ,Triggerfish ,Porgy, Perch and Shark , just to name a few
- Experience West Florida's deep blue waters, a fisherman's paradise where anglers from across the globe come for a one-of-a-kind experience
- Kick back and relax as a seasoned captain and crew takes you to the best fishing spots in the gulf

- Half-day fishing charter
- Fishing gear, including cut bait, tackle, stringer, hand towel, and bottled water 
- Fishing license
- Cooler with ice 
- Free parking

- Must be 3+ years of age to participate
- You may bring a small cooler with food and beverages or canned beer 
- No glass bottles or hard liquor allowed

- Please check in 30 minutes prior to departure
- 18 % gratuity is suggested. The crew will cut and filet fish

entries.name: Half-Day Public Deep Sea Fishing in St. Pete

blurbs.value: Uncover the historic Lorain Lighthouse on a guided tour. Walk through the interior and learn about the structure's history and more.

- Kick off the fun with a complimentary shuttle ride to and from the historic Lorain Lighthouse
- Explore the lighthouse's interior on a guided tour, exploring the structure with a professional by your side 
- Hear stories about the history of the lighthouse as volunteers stand by eager to answer any questions you may have
- Guided tour

entries.name: Lorain Lighthouse Tour

blurbs.value: Cancel by the night before the trip for a full refund or to reschedule.

Cruise around the harbor waters of Cape May for a bird watching adventure full of beautiful sights. Your professional captain guides you through salty marshes and inland waters where a variety of feathered flyers nest.

- Keep your eyes peeled for a huge variety of flying wildlife in this bird haven: Osprey, shorebirds, egrets, raptors, and clapper rails soar through the sky
- Sail these salty waters with a professional captain, who guides you along coastal wetlands and salt marshes
- Learn about the creatures you see from a professional naturalist, who provides informative tidbits for curious minds
- Birding cruise with captain and naturalist

entries.name: 2.5-Hour Bird Watching Cruise in Cape May

blurbs.value: No refunds for no-shows due to scheduling issues on the parties' behalf; however, you do have the ability to reschedule.
Break out of the nation's most notorious prison during this escape room adventure that tests your resolve and brain power. Crack puzzles and hunt for clues to get off of Alcatraz.

- Prepare for some fun with an escape room adventure that puts your wits to the test
- Race against the clock to find the way out before the hour is up and you're stuck in prison
- Play along with an engaging scenario where you enter the mind of a convict, putting an escape plan into action
- Escape room game

entries.name: Escape From Alcatraz Game in Nashville

blurbs.value:
- Deposits are refundable only with more than 72 hours notice. 
- Carousel Horse Farm may cancel due to dangerous weather conditions.
- In the event Carousel Horse Farm cancels a reservation for any reason, a credit will be provided for use on any future service provided by Carousel Horse Farm.
Take to the winding trails of Maines on a guided-horseback ride in the valley of Mt. Washington, home to breathtaking views and diverse local wildlife.

- Sit back and relax on a guided horseback ride that is ideal for all skill levels and ages, making for a great time all around 
- Explore a trail that winds through woods and fields providing impressive views of Mt. Washington on a clear day
- Get a chance to see plenty of local wildlife along the way, such as deer, fox, wild turkeys and birds of prey
- Helmets

- Please arrive 10 minutes early to fill out releases and get fitted for helmets.
- All trail riders must be 6 or older, wear long pants, and close-toed shoes.
- In colder weather, please wear thin gloves for grip and simple hats that fit under a helmet.

entries.name: Sunset Guided Trail Ride in Casco

blurbs.value:
- If you wish to cancel, please call or email for a full refund
- You may move your booking to any day or time without notice

Put your senses to the test in this psychedelic maze. Wander through a labyrinth full of mirrors lit with black lights as you twist and turn down the otherworldly hallways filled with your own reflection, seeking the exit.

- Play your way through the infinite mirror maze—a 2,000-square-foot labyrinth with 77 mirrors to mask the real path
- See yourself reflected back in dozens of dead ends as you adventure your way through the maze—and try not to get lost
- Soak in the black-lit setting that's made a even more fun by music playing throughout the maze
- Walk through the maze as many time as you want with a single admission
- Explore Pier 39, a hopping waterfront stop that's famous for restaurants, entertainment and seal-sightings
- Unlimited access to the maze

- Absolutely no running
- No food or drink
- Young children cannot enter the maze alone
- Service pets are allowed
- Your ticket is valid for any day or time if you change your mind about when to experience the maze

entries.name: Magowan's Infinite Mirror Maze in San Francisco

blurbs.value:
We understand that sometimes things go wrong and there may be rare cases where you need to reschedule your session. TYF will reschedule or refund your session(s) subject to the table below, and try to get you active again on the date of your choice. Please be aware that programming changes are subject to guide availability and that second choice dates may take time to find:
 - Up to 15 days: 100%
 - 14 days to 8 days: 50%
 - Less than 7 days 0%
An exhilarating blend of scrambling, leaping and traversing along the coastline, where the sea meets the land. There are spots to jump, stretches to swim, caves to explore and waves to navigate.

- Explore the jagged coast of the Pembrokeshire Coast from above and the water below
- Scramble around pristine cliffs swim between rocks and jump from land to sea
- Experience saltwater adventure with the TYF team who pioneered the sport of Coasteering back in the 1980s and have taken over 200,000 people out on adventures
- Ensure your safety through experienced and knowledgeable guides that you get the best possible experience while on your adventure with us

- A friendly and experienced guide
- Helmet to protect your head
- Wetsuit to keep you warm 
- A buoyancy aid to keep you floating.

-Bring a towel and swimsuit. 
-You may also wish to bring a pair of old trainers to wear on the coasteer. If not you are welcome to use a pair from our selection.

entries.name: Discovery Coasteer on Pembrokeshire Coast

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least 24 hours in advance.
Giddy up for a sleigh ride through the Elk River Valley, which has hundreds of years of history. Have a friendly guide take you on a winding journey through gorgeous landscapes.

- Have some fun on a sleigh ride that's pulled by two beautiful black Percheron workhorses that lead you up along the river
- Journey through the Elk River Valley with a sleigh ride that follows the river through the lower pasture and across meadows
- Sip on hot chocolate and cider, plus enjoy live entertainment, all while escaping from the hustle and bustle of your daily routine

- Transportation
- Live entertainment
- Two sleigh rides
- Food, hot chocolate, hot cider, and bottle water
There are blankets on the sled.

entries.name: Elk River Valley Sleigh Ride
